description: Try our easy to follow Italian-Style Beef & Balsamic Onion Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: ItalianStyle Beef & Balsamic Onion Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle steaks with 1 tbs oil and season with salt and pepper. Heat a large frying pan over high heat. Cook steaks for 3 minutes on each side or until a dark golden crust forms. Remove from pan and rest, covered, for 6 minutes.
Heat remaining oil in pan over medium heat. Cook onion for 5 minutes or until soft. Stir in vinegar, sugar and 2 tbs water, stirring until sugar dissolves. Bring to a simmer.
Add tomatoes to pan and simmer for 2 minutes or until tomato skins just begin to split and soften.
Thinly slice steaks. Arrange rocket on plates. Top with steak and onion and tomato mixture. Serve with a dollop of ricotta, basil leaves and drizzled with pan juices.
